label: applicableProcessCertificate
comment: A piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence that a process has met required criteria.

rangeIncludes.comment: A piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence that a process has met required criteria.

domainIncludes.comment: An individual, a group, or a body having a role in a trade business function.
Improving measures for manufactured components or products to meet end use requirements.
A process of either regaining substances in usable form, or of getting rid of substances regarding waste material, such as production waste.
A method or substance, such as chemical fertilizers and crop protection products, applied to plant growth whilst managing and controlling diseases and pests.
